XPathFunctionsElement-available.summary: The element-available function determines if an element is available and returns true or false.
XPathFunctionsElement-available.returns: Returns true if and only if the expanded-name is the name of an instruction. If the expanded-name has a namespace URI equal to the XSLT namespace URI, then it refers to an element defined by XSLT. Otherwise, it refers to an extension element. If the expanded-name has a null namespace URI, the element-available function will return false.
